Question: On July 17, 1951, at almost 40 years old, this person gave birth to their first child, Lucie Désirée Arnaz.
Hints: This person was dubbed the "Queen of the Bs" (referring to her many roles in B-films).
Her aorta had ruptured in a second location and this person quickly lost consciousness.
A year and a half later, this person gave birth to her second child, Desiderio Alberto Arnaz IV, known as Desi Arnaz, Jr.
